attributes.action: Legalisation Of Cannabis For Medicinal Purposes
attributes.additional_details:
My name is Theodore Franklin and I am a student from Harris Crystal Palace in South London.
I believe that the Legalisation of Cannabis for Medicinal Purposes is an important issue because many scientists/doctors have found that the substance can help with many different illnesses and diseases such as Alzheimer's, many other mental illnesses.
Please sign this petition to raise awareness about the issue :)
